content: Hey, I remember that shak! What a pitiful sight it was, but man were those burgers good.
the chum bucket is still better..
I already know EXACTLY what sponge youre talking about LMAO
Atta boy Larry! Now hows about you put those uh 'gains' to the test and finally start working security at the KK for me?

NEVER! First of all, you should be less stingy and learn how to share. Secondly, I'm showing him this the very second he gets home. You sure do snort a lot like a PIG for someone whos supposed to be a CRAB!!!
wowowow i love internet beef LOLOL
